description.en:
The course focuses on the principles governing groundwater flow and the investigation of its chemical composition in different types of rocks.
During the course, models and equations that reflect groundwater movement are characterized, and the assessment of filtration parameters is discussed. Additionally, natural and anthropogenic factors shaping the chemical composition and quality of groundwater are introduced.
description.et: Kursus tegeleb põhjavee liikumise seaduspärasustega ja selle keemilise koostise kujunemise uurimisega erinevat tüüpi kivimites. Kursuse käigus iseloomustatakse põhjavee liikumist peegeldavaid mudeleid ja valemeid, käsitletakse filtratsiooniparameetrite hinnangut. Samuti tutvutakse looduslike ja antropogeensete teguritega, mis kujundavad põhjavee keemilist koostist ja kvaliteeti.

objectives.en: To study the principles governing groundwater flow and chemical evolution in different aquifers.
objectives.et: Tutvuda seaduspärasustega, mis juhivad põhjavee liikumist ning keemilist kujunemist erinevates põhjaveekihtides.

objectives.en: To provide the skills necessary for an early-career hydrogeologist.
objectives.et: Anda edasi oskused, mis on tarvis omandada karjääri alustaval hüdrogeoloogil.

objectives.en: To gain an introduction to groundwater modeling.

learning_outcomes.en: Able to explain the concepts and parameters characterizing an aquifer and understands how these are determined.
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab selgitada põhjaveekihti iseloomustavaid mõisteid ning parameetreid, teab kuidas viimaseid leitakse.

learning_outcomes.en: Able to describe groundwater flow in water-bearing formations and is familiar with the main equations used to describe groundwater movement.
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab kirjeldada põhjavee liikumist kivimites ning orienteerub peamistes põhjavee liikumist kirjeldavates valemites.

learning_outcomes.en: Understands the information required for groundwater modeling and is familiar with the groundwater modeling process.
learning_outcomes.et: Teab põhjavee modelleerimiseks vaja minevat informatsiooni ning on tutvunud põhjavee modelleerimise protsessiga.

learning_outcomes.en: Understands the main factors and processes determining the chemical composition of groundwater and is capable of taking water samples if necessary.
learning_outcomes.et: Teab peamisi põhjavee keemilist koostist määravaid tegureid ning protsesse. Oskab vajadusel võtta veeproovi.

independent_work.en:
1. Characterizing water flow, calculating gradient and flow direction
2. Independent reading (aquifer recharge and water movement) and answering related questions
3. Calculating subsidence based on aquifer compressibility
4. Drawing a conceptual model (wells in aquifers)
5. Calculating drawdowns in the groundwater layer. Seawater intrusion into a well. Interconnections between river and groundwater levels.
6. Modeling water flow using the TopoDrive program.
7. Calculating aquifer parameters based on pumping test and slug test data, using the Cooper-Jacob straight-line method and Hvorslev method.
8. Calculating aquifer parameters using Theis type curve.
9. A modeling task.
10. Interpreting pumping test and chemical analysis of water samples for a summary seminar.

The materials for these tasks and the submission of answers are managed via the Moodle platform, where the deadline for each individual task is also provided.
independent_work.et:
1. Vee voolamise iseloomustamine, gradiendi ja voolusuuna arvutamine
2. Iseseisev lugemine (veekihtide toitumine ning vee liikumine) ning küsimustele vastamine
3. Vajumite arvutamine vastavalt veekihi kokkusurutavusele
4. Kontseptuaalse mudeli joonistamine (kaevud veekihtides)
5. Alanduste arvutamine põhjaveekihis. Merevee sissetung kaevu. Jõe- ning põhjaveetaseme omavahelised seosed.
6. Vee voolamise modelleerimine TopoDrive programmis. 
7. Pumpamiskatse  ning slug-testi andmete põhjal veekihi parameetrite arvutamine, kasutades Cooper-Jacobi sirgjoonelist meetodidt ning Hvorslevi meetodit. 
8. Veekihi parameetrite arvutamine kasutades Theisi tüüpkõverat. 
9. Modelleerimisülesanne
10. Pumpamiskatse ning veeproovi keemilisete analüüside interpretatsioon kokkuvõtva seminari jaoks.  

Ülesannete materjalid ning vastuste esitamine käib Moodle keskkonna kaudu, kus on ära toodud ka iga individuaalse ülesande tähtaeg.

description.en:
The written final assessment consists of a written exam that determines the overall grade for the course (timely completion of homework and tests only ensures eligibility to take the exam).

The exam is worth 100 points (100%). To pass the course, a minimum of 51 points (51%) must be achieved on the exam.
description.et:

Kogu eksam annab 100 punkti (mis on 100%). Aine läbimiseks on eksamil vaja saada vähemalt 51 punkti (51%).

grade_preconditions.en:
Each homework assignment earns 1 point, for a total of 10 points.
Completing the review test earns 1 point.

A total of 11 points is required to qualify for the exam. Therefore, all homework assignments must be submitted, and the review test must be completed beforehand.

Iga kodune ülesanne annab ühe punkti, seega kokku 10 punkti.
Kontrolltöö sooritamine annab 1 punkti. 

Eksamile pääsemiseks tuleb saada 11 punkti. Seega enne seda peab olema esitatud kõik kodutööd ning sooritatud kontrolltöö.

A.en: The exam result must be at least 91% of the total possible points.

B.en: The exam result must be at least 81% of the total possible points.

C.en: The exam result must be at least 71% of the total possible points.

D.en: The exam result must be at least 61% of the total possible points.

E.en: The exam result must be at least 51% of the total possible points.

F.en: The exam result is less than 51% of the total possible points.

mi.en: If a student has not submitted at least one homework assignment or has not completed the review test, they are ineligible to take the exam. Alternatively, the student may also fail to appear for the exam.
mi.et: Tudengil on esitamata vähemalt 1 kodutöö või tegemata kontrolltöö, mille tõttu ei saa sooritada eksamit või tudeng ei ilmu eksamile.

debt_elimination.en:
All homework assignments must be submitted by the specified deadlines. Tests must also be completed within the given time frame.

In case of scheduling issues, the instructor must be informed. With a valid reason, it is possible to resolve any outstanding tasks by agreement with the instructor.

Ajaliste probleemide tekkimisel tuleb õppejõudu teavitada ning mõjuva põhjusega saab kokkuleppel õppejõuga võlgnevusi likvideerida.

description.en:
An Introductory Lecture on Groundwater Dynamics
The hydrological cycle and its components. Water balance.
Groundwater systems (aquifers and aquitards), water table, potentiometric surface, gradient
description.et:
Sissejuhatav loeng põhjavee dünaamikasse.
Veeringe ning selle elemendid. Veebilanss
Põhjaveekompleksid (veekihid ja veepidemed), veetase, survetase, gradient.

description.en:
Aquifer Parameters and Properties
(Porosity, hydraulic conductivity, permeability, specific yield and storativity, transmissivity, aquifer elasticity, [an]isotropy, [homo]heterogeneity, aquifer compressibility).
description.et: Veekihi parameetrid ja omadused (poorsus, filtratsioonikoefitsent, veeläbilaskvus, veemahtuvus, veejuhtivus, veekihi elastsus, [an]isotroopsus, [homo]heterogeensus, veekihi kokkusurutavus).

description.en:
Principles of Groundwater Flow, Steady state and transient Flow. Flow in confined and unconfined aquifers.
Recharge area and radius of influence of a well.
description.et:
Põhjaveeliikumise põhiprintsiibid, tasakaaluline ja mittetasakaaluline voolamine. 
Voolamine survelise ja surveta põhjaveekihis. 
Veehaarde toiteala ja mõjuraadius.

topic.en: Aquifer testing and calculating aquifer parameters

description.en:
Drilling of wells. 
Determination of the parameters of an aquifer using pumping tests, slug tests, earth tides, and permeameter tests.
Calculation of parameters from test results.
description.et:
Puurkaevu rajamine.
Põhjaveekihi hüdrodünaamiliste parameetrite määramine: Pumpamiskatsed, slug-testid, maa-looded, permeameetri katsed.
Parameetrite arvutamine katsete tulemustest.

description.en:
Introduction to groundwater modelling.
Modeling phases. Creating conceptual models.
description.et:
Sissejuhatus põhjavee modelleerimisse.
Modelleerimise etapid.
Kontseptuaalse mudeli loomine.

description.en: Getting familiarized with Modflow and the program ModelMuse. Creating a simple numerical model for groundwater flow.
description.et: Tutvume Modflow-ga ning programmiga ModelMuse. Numbrilise näidismudeli loomine.

topic.en: The chemical composition of groundwater and it's properties

description.en: Main and trace elements. Ion balance. Main chemical and physical properties.
description.et: Põhielemendid ja jälgelemendid. Ioontasakaal. Keemilised ja füüsikalised omadused.

description.en: The main chemical processes in aquifers. Groundwater types and graphical methods to determine them.
description.et: Peamised keemilised protsessid põhjavees. Põhjavee tüübid, nende graafiline kujutamine.

topic.en: Pollutants in groundwater and vulnerability of aquifers.

description.en: The most prominent pollutants of aquifers and groundwater, different problems with groundwater quality. The vulnerability assessment and mapping.
description.et: Põhjavee reostuse allikad - probleemid põhjaveega. Põhjavee kaitstuse hindamine.

topic.en: Taking water samples for chemical analyses

description.en:
The water sampling practices. Nuances in taking samples for different analyses. 
Discharge Measurement techniques in streams.
description.et:
Veeproovide võtmise praktika. Tähelepanekud proovide võtmisel erinevate elementide määramiseks. 
Vooluhulgad vooluveekogudes.

description.en: Carrying out a pumping test in an aquifer (conducting the test depends on the availability of an observation well)

topic.en: Measuring the main elements in water samples

description.en: Measuring the main constituents of water samples in laboratory.
The main takeaways from the results of pumping test and chemical analyses.
description.et: Võtame kokku pumpamiskatsete tulemuse informatsiooni ning keemilise analüüsi tulemused.
